articles.description: Ohio State alum Evan Turner comes calling for the $100 Draymond Green owes him for the Buckeyes' victory against Michigan State.
articles.headline: Draymond pays off his bet to Turner

images.caption: Ohio State alum Evan Turner comes calling for the $100 Draymond Green owes him for the Buckeyes' victory against Michigan State.
images.name: Draymond pays off his bet to Turner

articles.description: Sophomore Nolan Narain came off the bench to score a career-high 18 points and fellow reserve Jordan Schakel had 14 points for San Diego State, which raced to a 23-point lead before holding off Wyoming 87-77 Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Reserves Narain, Schakel spark SDSU to 87-77 win vs Wyoming

articles.description: Kendall Stephens tied his career-high with 21 points and Caleb Martin also had 21 to lead No. 24 Nevada past Boise State 77-72 on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: No. 24 Nevada beats Boise State 77-72

images.caption: Kendall Stephens pulls up from deep and knocks down a 3 to tie the game at 27-27.
images.name: Nevada's Stephens shows range to tie game

articles.description: There was no doubt who was the better team on Wednesday as No. 10 Auburn easily dispatched an unranked Kentucky team.
articles.headline: Auburn keeps doing what it's done all season, even against Kentucky

images.caption: While Anfernee McLemore and the Tigers made just 36.7 percent of their field goals, it was enough to beat a slumping Wildcats squad.
images.name: Anfernee McLemore celebration [576x324]

articles.description: Jovan Mooring scored 24 points, Brandon McCoy added 10 points and 13 rebounds and UNLV beat Air Force 81-73 on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: UNLV pulls away late, beats Air Force 81-73

articles.description: Kyvon Davenport scored with 13 seconds remaining and Jamal Johnson added a free throw with four seconds on the clock and a balanced Memphis squad held off SMU 70-67 Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Memphis outlasts McMurray, SMU in 70-67 squeaker
